slide.title: SquirrelMail
slide.example: % siege |ffff00|-H| "Cookie: squirrelmail_language=; SQMSESSID=10c85281f476600ee102e2db24354612; key=0Ce3/xkJ" \ |ffff00|-c| 10 http://mail.ubuntu/src/right_main.php |ffff00|-b| |ffff00|-r| 200 ** SIEGE 2.66 ** Preparing 10 concurrent users for battle. The server is now under siege.. done. Transactions: 2000 hits Availability: 100.00 % Elapsed time: 64.69 secs Data transferred: 2.81 MB Response time: |ffff00|0.26 secs| Transaction rate: |ffff00|30.92 trans/sec| Throughput: 0.04 MB/sec Concurrency: 8.06 Successful transactions: 2000 Failed transactions: 0 Longest transaction: 27.14 Shortest transaction: 0.02
